item.title: Renée add a quote by Philip Pullman
item.description: "I think it's perfectly possible to explain how the universe came about without bringing God into it, but I don't know everything, and there may well be a God somewhere, hiding away. Actually, if he is keeping out of sight, it's because he's ashamed of his followers and all the cruelty and ignorance they're responsible for promoting in his name. If I were him, I'd want nothing to do with them." -- Philip Pullman

item.title: Renée add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Renée add a quote by George Burns
item.description: "Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city." -- George Burns

item.title: Renée add a quote by Jon Stewart
item.description: "Religion. It's given people hope in a world torn apart by religion." -- Jon Stewart

item.title: Renée add a quote by Eddie Izzard
item.description: "What have you been reading, The Gospel according to St. Bastard?!" -- Eddie Izzard

item.title: Renée add a quote by Eddie Izzard
item.description: "We will now sing forth, hymn 405, 'Oh God, what on earth is my hairdo all about?" -- Eddie Izzard

item.title: Renée add a quote by Raymond Chandler
item.description: "The girl gave him a look which ought to have stuck at least four inches out of his back." -- Raymond Chandler

item.title: Renée add a quote by Robin McKinley
item.description: "I don't put up with being messed around, and I don't suffer fools gladly. The short version of that is that I'm a bitch. Trust me, I can provide character references." -- Robin McKinley
